Question: Korea Deep Learning Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
DeepX

Product: AI Accelerator Chips for Neural Processing Units (NPUs)

- First AI chip company to win the CES Innovation Award in three categories: computer hardware, embedded technology, and robotics
- Groundbreaking AI semiconductor technologies include AI algorithm technology for edge AI applications and power-efficient NPUs
- Real-time applications demonstrated in smart cameras, mobility solutions, robots, and smart appliances
